title: Pixel 4 call Volume and Speaker sound very quiet even though volume set to max.
content:
Phone call volume and speaker (when phone ringing or playing music) is very  quiet even though all sound levels are set to max. 
Google assistant will here my comments but then not do the actions "hey google, call mum" shows on the screen but then wont make the call. 

Mic seems to be fine as other can clearly hear me on phone calls i struggle to hear them. 

Phone will also show full service then randomly end a call show no service available and then moments later have full service and allow me to call again. 

Have tried safe mode and resetting the phone . 
Nothing has worked.
